The trainer has eight options that you can use:

- F1: Active Trainer - This option enables the trainer and allows you to use the other options.
- F2: Inf.Health - This option gives you unlimited health and prevents you from dying.
- F3: Inf.Stamina - This option gives you unlimited stamina and allows you to run and sprint without getting tired.
- F4: Inf.Money - This option gives you unlimited money and allows you to buy anything you want from traders and vendors.
- F5: Inf.Ammo - This option gives you unlimited ammo and prevents your weapons from running out of bullets.
- F6: No Reload - This option removes the need to reload your weapons and allows you to fire continuously.
- F7: Inf.Weight - This option removes the weight limit and allows you to carry as much items as you want without being encumbered.
- F8: Better Accuracy - This option improves your accuracy and reduces the recoil of your weapons.
